description.en:
As problems continue to plague the elementary school system, a new solution is enacted in the form of the School Judgment System! Now the young students themselves will be responsible for solving the issues that befall them! But are they up to the task?

[b]Included one-shots:[/b]
Volume 3: Gakkyuu Houtei (2 parts)

[b]Officially published:[/b]
[*]In english by VIZ Media as [i]School Judgment: Gakkyu Hotei[/i]
[*]In spanish by [url=https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/S/4411/1/los-juicios-escolares/]Norma Editorial[/url] as [i]Los Juicios Escolares[/i]
[*]In french by [url=https://www.kana.fr/produit/school-judgment/]Kana[/url] as [i]School Judgment[/i]
